items.sentence: Tom isn\'t as poor as most people think he is.
Tom isn\'t very likely to know how to do that.
Did you really swim for three hours yesterday?
Did you really think that was what Tom wanted?
Did you say everything that you wanted to say?
I don\'t think there is any way I can do that.
I don\'t understand why Tom needed to do that.
I finally got the call that I was waiting for.
I haven\'t had a drink since Valentine\'s Day.
Even if you\'re right, what\'s the difference?
